content.question: The overall trend depicted in the graph best reflects which of the following?

choices.label: The expansion of renewable energy sources to address environmental concerns in the 1970s
The decline of coal as a major source of power beginning in the 1950s
The rejection of nuclear power following the end of the Vietnam War
The increased demand for all sources of power following the Second World War

content.answer: The increased demand for all sources of power following the Second World War

topic.text: 8.13: The Environment and Natural Resources from 1968 to 1980

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
